EmailTemplate.name: Alchemist Lead
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your interest in Alchemy
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in becoming a Palmetto Alchemist. We appreciate you reaching out. Please set up an appointment with a Palmetto Account Executive so that we may properly assist you.
https://forms.gle/FJUt4Pddecd4VUKW9
https://calendly.com/bennett-barton/alchemist
Thank you,
The Palmetto Team
